snippet.title: Paws - A Shelter 2 Game Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Paws - A Shelter 2 Game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/434000/Paws__A_Shelter_2_Game/

Journey through the world as a young lynx cub in the standalone, single player adventure Paws – A Shelter 2 Game. Traverse a vast and harrowing landscape together with your companion. Together you will follow tracks, fend off threats and overcome obstacles as you try to make your way home. 

Paws – A Shelter 2 Game combines all the unique elements from the beloved Shelter game series to present a lovingly crafted story about loss, friendship and a search for lost love. Venture out in the world and make your way home. An amazing journey awaits you.

Main features:
A gripping, narrative experience in a fantasy setting.
For the first time ever in the Shelter world, you play as a young lynx cub accompanied by a companion to help complete puzzles and overcome obstacles.
New gameplay features include the ability to follow tracks using your sense ability.
New original music from Retro Family.
A whole new corner of the world of Shelter to explore.

Explore the indie games from Might & Delight here:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/mightanddelight/
